summary: Jonathan is a very lonely man. One day, he gets a visitor in his house: a young woman who, through a jarring turn of events, ends up dead. He does not report it because he is happy to have a friend, but now the body begins to decay.
cast: Rob Zabrecky|Lisa Howard|Elisha Yaffe|Jackie Hoffman|Meaghan Banville|Hannah Barron|Taylor Brown|Shannon K. Dunn|Reese Ehlinger|Gustine Fudickar|Kathryn Gould|Chris Guarino|Amanda Hargreaves|Michael Haskins|Whitney Hayes|Jeff Huling|Denielle Fisher Johnson|Jason Knauf|Alf Kremer|Dave Leikam|Emma V. Peltes|Quinn Perkins|Hannah Presher|J.T. Richardson
title: Decay
